: AnalysisException should be a subclass of the STL exception

Class Camera

Class Cutter

: this is a badly designed class. Cutter should be a small object which applies a specific set of cuts (subclasses for other cutting methods). All the analysis should be done elsewhere.

: For multi-telescope analysis, make a telescope_id argument or field and only process events from the specified telescope.

: Implement 2-D analysis for tracking runs (currently, only ON/OFF pairs are used.

: separate total alpha plot for tracking runs.

Member PedestalFinder::getPeds (RunInfo &ri, const std::string &id, std::vector< Pedestal > &, int telescope_id=0)

: Simulations only contain one pedestal record, so their dispersions are always 0. Due to this, the ImageCleaner accepts too many pixels, since it uses the picthresh*peddisp as the threshold! Need to fix somehow...

: implement lockfiles to prevent more than one process from writing/reading to the database (necessary for the MPI-enabled or a multi-threaded version)

Class RunInfo

: Make RunInfo serializable so it can be sent as an MPI message?

: Make RunInfo saveable (i.e. write out a config file containing all the settings. This can be written to each run output dir so you can check what settings were used at the last parameterization. You can then use a Config object to parse the saved settings and check if the RunInfo has changed as a robust check for reparameterizing. Save() load() compare()
